subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Pronunciation 1 and 2 comes respectively from [[w:Literary_and_colloquial_readings_of_Chinese_characters|白讀 and 文讀]] of {{inh|zh|ltc|-}} {{ltc-l|給}}
